name: Peanut Adventure
description:
The long awaited sequel has finally arrived!

kinda.

This is a first person perspective game where instead of a human, you're my adorable little kitty Peanut. Look around and wonder the living room she loves to frequent and do things! It's obviously still a WIP and nowhere near done, I'd hoped to have added more interactive elements but due to various issues i was unable. I still hope you enjoy this little glimpse nonetheless :)

Use WASD to Move, Space to Jump

Music: Easy Feelings ~inside the cinema~ from Persona Q2
